data.quote: You can have everything you want in life if you just help enough people get what they want in life.
data.author: Zig Ziglar

data.quote: If I have the belief that I can do it, I shall surely acquire the capacity to do it even if I may not have it at the beginning.
data.author: Gandhi

data.quote: It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are.
data.author: E. E. Cummings

data.quote: Great minds have great purposes, others have wishes. Little minds are tamed and subdued by misfortune; but great minds rise above them.
data.author: Washington Irving

data.quote: The start is what stops most people.
data.author: Don Shula

data.quote: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you desing for the present.
data.author: Jim Rohn

data.quote: Life is like a box of chocolates. You never know what you are going to get.
data.author: Forrest Gump

data.quote: The cold days are the best days. You can always add more layers, but there's only so many you can take off.
data.author: anonymous

data.quote: Everyone is a genius. But if you judge a fish by its ability to climb a tree, it will live its whole life believing that it is stupid.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: If you're not 15 minutes early, you're late. Unless you're the queen.
data.author: anonymous

data.quote: You can't always get what you want. But if you try sometimes, you just might find, you get what you need.
data.author: McJagger

data.quote: Baby carrots are making me gay.
data.author: Stephen Colbert

data.quote: All letters of love are Ridiculous. They wouldnâ€™t be love letters if they were not Ridiculous.
data.author: Fernando Pessoa
